name: Vikings may swim
description:
In the boring and cold winters, the vikings have to entertain them self. This winter, a new sport is in the making where the vikings prove their cunning, strength and agility. May the best viking never float.

Multiplayer up to 4 players.

Controls:
WASD - movement
Mouse - aiming
Space - jump
Secondary mouse - throw shield
Esc/H - toggle menu
